directions.step:
about 4 cups peeled, cubed sweet potatoes or yams 1 apple, skin on, chopped 2 stalks celery, sliced 1 small red onion, chopped 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, grated rice vinegar to taste
steam potatoes til soft, not mushy toss all ingredients lightly dress with vinegar to taste chill From: Jagordon@agsm.Ucla.Edu
From Gemini's MASSIVE MealMaster collection at www.synapse.com/~gemini
